localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
blogPost.body: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
blogPost.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.
blogPost.author: Cristiano Dalbem

localize.description: 选择一个频道，让你的大脑随着我们从最优秀的YouTube创作者那里精选的源源不断的视频流而漫游。当您工作、打开电视或邀请您的朋友一起观看时，享受自然的图像和声音让您放松。
localize.tagline: 精心策划的视频，让您在家中放松并探索世界。

localize.description: 選擇一個頻道，讓你的大腦隨着我們從最優秀的YouTube創作者那裏精選的源源不斷的視頻流而漫遊。當您工作、打開電視或邀請您的朋友一起觀看時，享受自然的圖像和聲音讓您放鬆。
localize.tagline: 精心策劃的視頻，讓您在家中放鬆並探索世界。

previous.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
previous.title: Toad - The simplest URL shortener

localize.description: Toad是最简单的URL缩短器，具有内置的API，详细的分析和自定义域名支持。Toad的设计既有趣又强大。是什么阻止了你？跃跃欲试吧
Toad是最簡單的URL縮短器，具有內置的API，詳細的分析和自定義域名支持。Toad的設計既有趣又強大。是什麼阻止了你？躍躍欲試吧

next.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
next.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自动化的网速性能分析工具。一个小型的开源脚本每隔一小时对docker镜像进行一次速度测试，并可以在易于使用的Dashboard上进行分析。
ISP Logger是一款自動化的網速性能分析工具。一個小型的開源腳本每隔一小時對docker鏡像進行一次速度測試，並可以在易於使用的Dashboard上進行分析。
